00025 #include "Common/ReferenceCount.h"

00029 namespace Hypertable {
00030 
00031   typedef struct {
00032     int error;
00033     uint8_t *base;
00034     uint32_t len;
00035   } FailedRegionT;
00036 
00040   class TableMutatorSendBuffer : public ReferenceCount {
00041   public:
00042     TableMutatorSendBuffer(TableIdentifier *tid, TableMutatorCompletionCounter *cc, RangeLocator *rl) : counterp(cc), m_table_identifier(tid), m_range_locator(rl) { return; }
00043     void add_retries(uint32_t offset, uint32_t len) {
00044       accum.add(pending_updates.base+offset, len);
00045       counterp->set_retries();
00046       pending_updates.own = true;
00047       // invalidate row key
00048       const uint8_t *ptr = pending_updates.base+offset;
00049       Serialization::decode_vi32(&ptr);
00050       m_range_locator->invalidate(m_table_identifier, (const char *)ptr);
00051     }
00052     void add_retries_all() {
00053       accum.add(pending_updates.base, pending_updates.size);
00054       counterp->set_retries();
00055       pending_updates.own = true;
00056       // invalidate row key
00057       const uint8_t *ptr = pending_updates.base;
00058       Serialization::decode_vi32(&ptr);
00059       m_range_locator->invalidate(m_table_identifier, (const char *)ptr);
00060     }
00061     void add_errors(int error, uint32_t offset, uint32_t len) {
00062       FailedRegionT failed;
00063       failed.error = error;
00064       failed.base = pending_updates.base + offset;
00065       failed.len = len;
00066       failed_regions.push_back(failed);
00067       counterp->set_errors();
00068       pending_updates.own = true;
00069     }
00070     void add_errors_all(uint32_t error) {
00071       FailedRegionT failed;
00072       failed.error = (int)error;
00073       failed.base = pending_updates.base;
00074       failed.len = pending_updates.size;
00075       failed_regions.push_back(failed);
00076       counterp->set_errors();
00077       pending_updates.own = true;
00078     }
00079     void clear() {
00080       key_offsets.clear();
00081       accum.clear();
00082       delete [] pending_updates.base;
00083       pending_updates.base = 0;
00084       pending_updates.size = 0;
00085       pending_updates.own = true;
00086       failed_regions.clear();
00087     }
00088     void reset() {
00089       clear();
00090       dispatch_handler_ptr = 0;
00091     }
00092     void get_failed_regions(std::vector<FailedRegionT> &errors) {
00093       errors.insert(errors.end(), failed_regions.begin(), failed_regions.end());
00094     }
00095 
00096     std::vector<uint64_t> key_offsets;
00097     DynamicBuffer accum;
00098     StaticBuffer pending_updates;
00099     struct sockaddr_in addr;
00100     TableMutatorCompletionCounter *counterp;
00101     DispatchHandlerPtr dispatch_handler_ptr;
00102     std::vector<FailedRegionT> failed_regions;
00103   private:
00104     TableIdentifier *m_table_identifier;
00105     RangeLocator *m_range_locator;
00106   };
00107   typedef boost::intrusive_ptr<TableMutatorSendBuffer> TableMutatorSendBufferPtr;

00109 }
